duties_responsibilities.duty: Supporting Store Manager and Assistant Store Manager in achieving retail store targets by driving sales.
Opening and closing the store in the absence of other management, ensuring safe and legal trading.
Delivering sales through friendly and efficient customer service.
Ensuring a fun and enjoyable shopping experience for customers.
Demonstrating and assisting customers with products and queries.
Assisting with store deliveries, visual merchandising, stock takes, markdowns, and promotions.
Performing ear piercing after receiving full training.
Ensuring the store looks presentable and inviting to customers.
